thread.title: Amazon Web Services Turns Heads with Web Application Firewall, but It’s Really No Big Deal
thread.title_full: Amazon Web Services Turns Heads with Web Application Firewall, but It’s Really No Big Deal

author: Parizo, Eric
title: Amazon Web Services Turns Heads with Web Application Firewall, but It’s Really No Big Deal
text: October 07, 2015 Rate this report Intelligence Alert The new AWS WAF offers an intriguing option for SMBs and others heavily invested in the cloud giant’s infrastructure, but its limited features and odd pay-per-rule pricing model pose little threat to established cloud-based WAF providers, for now.
